```{r setup, echo=FALSE,results='asis'}
suppressMessages(library(texPreview))
suppressMessages(library(xtable))

tex_opts$set(
  returnType= knitr::opts_knit$get('rmarkdown.pandoc.to')
)

```

## Table 1

```{r testOut}
tex_preview( obj = xtable::xtable(head(iris,20)))

```

```{r testOut2}
tab='
\\begin{tabular}{llr}
\\hline
\\multicolumn{2}{c}{Item} \\\\
\\cline{1-2}
Animal    & Description & Price (\\$) \\\\
\\hline
Gnat      & per gram    & 13.65      \\\\
          & each        & 0.01       \\\\
Gnu       & stuffed     & 92.50      \\\\
Emu       & stuffed     & 33.33      \\\\
Armadillo & frozen      & 8.99       \\\\
\\hline
\\end{tabular}'

tex_preview(obj = tab)

```
